website_summaries.verdict: The Plantronics RIG 500E is a flexible, modular gaming headset that offers your choice of 3.5mm and USB connections, and closed and vented earcups.
cons: Earcups easily pop off headband when not in use
Surround sound isn't effective in a headset

customer_reviews.title: I hear everything!
customer_reviews.text: Well.... I chose to buy this product because i have worked with Plantronics in my job. This was by far one of my favorite purchases this year. The sound quality is fantastic and the set up / attachments feel sturdy but also ultra light weight with 2 different ear cups, i guarantee you will find this a gaming headset you can wear for hours. The headset offers Aux option for basic sound and the ability to plug into a controller and a USB option plus headset button for 7.1. Great job Plantronics
customer_reviews.author: Gamethology101

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: you get a second set of head cans with this set so very good value, and the accessories available are also very good. the Surround Sound adapter is very good with most things movies / tv and games, but some games have issues with some very bad crackling sound when turning the Surround on. could do with some firmware update
customer_reviews.author: E Qui

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality and versatility of the product is great. All leads are supplied where the headset will work with your PC, phone and Xbox one (as long as you have the controller with the headphone jack. The surround sound though will only work with the pc (built in soundcard on the usb lead) Make sure to download the drivers from Plantronics to get the full surround sound experience. Very lightweight for long gaming sessions only complaint no volume control on the headset.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Honestly Utter Rubbish!
customer_reviews.text: These seem like a great idea but the volume is extremely low on either the built in usb sound card or a pre-amp. The surround sound makes audio quality even worse. I've had these for a month and been mostly disappointed until I accidentally left my loudspeakers connected with the headphones on my head and realised just how bad they were when I switched audio to the headphones. Also people complain about mic quality onilne. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Hilary C Ford

customer_reviews.title: Try before you buy.
customer_reviews.text: Over all good. Sound is flat, but this is how it should be, easy to hear footsteps and such. Small ear cups hurt my ears. Very light, but hard to adjust them to my head as they pull themselves back up again. Super easy to assemble. I couldn't pack them up again in to the original box at all. Send them back loose in a bigger box. Try before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Bah

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming headset I've ever had hands down
customer_reviews.text: Best gaming headset I've ever had hands down! Tried many different headsets over the years and found they all became uncomfortable after a few hours on my head. Either they would put too much pressure on my ears or headband and feel too heavy in general, giving me a headache sometimes. This headset is perfect because its very light and I can literally wear it for as long as I like without it becoming a chore to wear. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andy C

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: I find both earpieces comfy and can wear them for many hours. The elastic band also helps a lot as there is minimal pressure on my head. The sound quality is great, especially if you tweak with it's eq settings (via software). The mic is very clear but can distort your voice. Overall it's a great headset but I'd say wait until the price drops below £100 before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AmaanMiah

customer_reviews.title: Ear cups not large enough
customer_reviews.text: I keep seeing reviews that these are comfortable to wear for long periods. That's not true for me, I don't t have particularly large ears yet the ear cups are not large enough to completely fit over my ears and they get pinched. I know they have to design for kids but honestly I would have hoped for better forethought in the design for the price
customer_reviews.author: P from Kent

customer_reviews.title: Not really good for gaming
customer_reviews.text: So I like this headset but their is no volume control what so ever (really wished I got a better one as I use for gaming and need to hear footsteps) only control you have with theses is the in-game or on pc settings
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gaming Headphones
customer_reviews.text: My gaming son is happy with this - good surround sound. Nice option to be able to change the ear pads. Recommended kit at a sort of reasonable price (birthday, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: London Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable headset I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Love this headset. Best one I've had yet (and i go through them like crazy). Super comfortable, not tight at all. Only Issue that I had was there is no volume control on the wire.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsty McEwan

customer_reviews.title: Could be worse, I guess.
customer_reviews.text: Decent headset but nothing can beat Plantronics GameCom 788 yet. Also the sound in the right ear is louder than in the left one, I have no clue why. I've tried everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kou

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great value after a few mins doesn't feel like your wearing a headset surround sound is good use these for PS4 / PC Team Speak / VOX no problems
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade from the Gamecom 788s
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a better version of the Gamecom 780/788s then look no further. You can customise the headset completly from the sound to frame. Couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Vex

customer_reviews.title: The best headset I have bought
customer_reviews.text: The best headset I have bought. Seriously comfortable, the sound quality is great and the mic works a treat. I have been told I sound very clear. Would most definitely recommend, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: I love it, the sound quality is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love it, the sound quality is amazing, it's easy to put together But the only annoyting thing i have found with it, is that when i mute the mic, my friend cannot hear me, but he can hear all the videos that i'm watching, it is the same issue when the mic is unmuted as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear and come with amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear and come with amazing sound. If you are looking for good headphone for gaming I can't recommend these enough. Only problem I had was it took a while for my PC to pick up the headphones through USB, but, I'm pretty sure that was a fault on my part
customer_reviews.author: Raheem

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and suitable for all gamers. Comfortable and durable, definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING sound quality for gaming especially with 7.1 Surround sound cant complain
customer_reviews.author: Max S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, Although, they keep disconnecting every so often. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound could be higher but build is excellent and headset is extremely light
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great headset, really comfortable, great sound quality! Use it for competitive gaming as well as music playing all the time! Great value for money, definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Joe H

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good solid sounding headset with a lot of adjustability but just a touch unconfortable for long play sessions
customer_reviews.author: Chris Perry

customer_reviews.title: Plantronics 500E (Isolated) model H5 headset has a good balance of bass and fidelity (for the price range) with a detachable mic
customer_reviews.text: Plantronics 500E (Isolated) model H5 headset has a good balance of bass and fidelity (for the price range) with a detachable mic, both isolated and open (reduced bass, volume but better fidelity.) headphones was satisfactory for gaming, music, and movies. The 500E (Isolated) model H5, sounded better than the following headphones: Plantronics 780, Plantronics RIG 500HD (it's volume, bass and fidelity was below 500E open cups, even after a replacement of a defective headset with clipped bass), TDK ST-550 (high fidelity, low bass), AKG K420 (lacks soundstage for surround sound) and Asus Cerberus headset (it's bass overshadows fidelity). The 500E is light on the head, comfortable, tiny bit tight on ears, decent sound isolation, nice sub-bass and good bass levels.
customer_reviews.author: SBH

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and the sound quality is great
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and the sound quality is great. Also brilliant to have 2 sets of earphones that come with it, one for noise isolation and the other for comfort. Only giving 3 stars tho as these are rather quiet, 40mm just are not loud enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: J G

customer_reviews.title: arrived and look great
customer_reviews.text: They seem great but only just received them so reserving judgement
customer_reviews.author: Ms. S. L. Marriott

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, mic has broken after a month of use, sound quality is mediocre at best, avoid like the plague.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: overall its a great headset however it keeps disconnecting if i move when ...
customer_reviews.text: overall its a great headset however it keeps disconnecting if i move when i wear it so hense the 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: adam hughes

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and no mic quality issues. I find this headset is really comfortable and fits over my ears well so i can wear it for long periods of time without it getting uncomfortable. Is quite expensive but i think it is worth the price for a good quality gaming headset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: RIG 500E Surround Sound PC Headset - E-sport Edition (PC)
product_meta.description:
Designed around the needs of e-sports players and endorsed by ESL, the RIG 500E headset is a fitting match for your needs, from intense training sessions to events, and everywhere in between.

The durable yet lightweight frame lets you configure the acoustic profile to suit your needs and features a noise-canceling removable boom mic. Vented earcups deliver maximum breathability, reducing fatigue over long sessions where you don’t need to block external noise. Choose the isolating earcups when you need to focus and be immersed in your game, blocking out distracting background noise.

Experience the audio advantage of Dolby 7.1 surround sound technology, hearing a stunning 360-degree sound field with pinpoint accuracy for faster reactions. Between games, the high resolution, 24-bit encoded audio support reveals all the detail of your favorite music.

The e-sports story

When professional teams and players step on stage, they expect nothing less than competitiongrade audio. ESL, the world’s largest e-sports company, relies on the quality and performance delivered by Plantronics to bring an unforgettable e-sports experience to players and millions of fans worldwide. The Plantronics RIG 500E is a unique, first-of-its-kind headset, developed over years and in collaboration with competitive gamers. From the makers of the tournament-grade, stadium-class headset GameCom Commander, it is designed from the ground up for competitive players, with a finely tuned focus on flexibility and individual choice. Each component is designed with specific e-sports goals in mind, giving you options in every competitive scenario, from intense training sessions to events, and everywhere in between.



BOX CONTAINS
Headset frame, self-adjusting headband, isolating earcups, vented earcups, removable mic boom, USB Dolby adapter, 3.5mm analog cable
feature_bullets: Components easily snap into headset frame
Includes both vented and isolating earcup sets
